Ihya Productions, Dar al Islam and the Zaytuna Institute
present a groundbreaking lecture program

*****************************************************
B E Y O N D S C H O O L I N G
building communities where learning really matters
*****************************************************

Speakers:
Hamza Yusuf Hanson, John Taylor Gatto
& other eminent advocates for educational reform

Saturday March 17, 2001
University of Toronto
(Convocation Hall and Medical Sciences Building Auditorium)
Located just northwest of Queen's Park TTC Station at University Ave.
and College St.

Program:
2:00 pm @ Medical Sciences Building Auditorium -
FORUM ON ALTERNATIVE EDUCATION: A panel discussion featuring
representatives of several noted alternative schools

**7:30 pm @ Convocation Hall (doors open at 6:45 pm) -
FEATURE LECTURE: Hamza Yusuf Hanson and John Taylor Gatto

Tickets $10 (includes both sessions). Available at the door.
To avoid dissapointment please buy in advance through
www.ihyaproductions.com at (416) 924-0968
or through Ticketmaster.ca by calling (416) 870-8000

Plenty of parking available on St. George Street and King's
College Circle. Map available at www.utoronto.ca
